attributes.action: start spending money on our armed forces instead of expecting them to go into combat situations with below standard and second best equipment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for example our soldiers in iraq and especially afganistan are operating without enough protection or firepower.  Provide them with more challenger 2s and warriers hence more protection.

rejection.details: THere is already a similar petition: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/DefenceFunding/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
